EmailTemplate.subject: Additional Application for What a Liberty (Deadline 07/02/2016)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
JOIN WHAT A LIBERTY WITH INDEX ON CENSORSHIP!
Dear {!Contact.Name},
Thank you for recently expressing your interest in the What A Liberty programme by Index on Censorship.
We have had initial applications from over 200 NCS graduates from all over London who all want to be involved in this fantastic opportunity. Unfortunately as this is the first year we only have 15 spaces available at the recruitment workshop.
If you are still interested in being involved please complete this additional application form by clicking here, so we can find out more about you, and why you want to be involved!
Things to consider:
- You need to be able to attend the recruitment event on Tuesday 16th of February between 10:00 and 16:00;
- You need to be between 16 - 21 and based in London;
- You need to be flexible and able to attend workshops in the weekend, evenings and holidays;
- You need to be able to commit to approximately 30 hours and month in March and April and 15 hours a month in May and June.
Successful applicants will be provided with travel and food expenses. Additional support needs can be provided to ensure accessibility to all.
Rhiannon Downer
Graduate Associate Manager - South East London
